problem.p: This is a concept question, provided to check your understanding of the previous lecture video clips.
Which of the following are true?

choice.text: Span [mathjaxinline]\{ |00\rangle , |01\rangle \}[/mathjaxinline] has stabilizer group [mathjaxinline]\langle Z_1\rangle[/mathjaxinline] and is a trivial code.
Any one-dimensional subspace is a trivial code.
Any stabilizer code can be transformed to a trivial code by applying a unitary.
